mdRecord.dcterms:description: A graffiti possibly by a Texas transplant. Expression of the need to be productive, emulating the diary entry style typical of the wall of this carrel, and possibly signed with a name [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
TX proud, UVA prouder. | gotta get shit done | Sept 17, 11:03 AM -Bianka
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Regionalism
Diaries
